website_summaries.verdict: Bass lovers will find plenty to love about the exercise-friendly, budget-priced Skullcandy Method earphones.
pros: Powerful audio performance with heavily boosted bass, and sculpted high-mids and highs
Secure fit and design ideal for exercise
Inline remote control and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Intense, boosted bass not for anyone looking for accurate, flat response

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: While it took a little while to get used to having them in, I usually experience that with in-ear earphones. The sound from them is very good, and the in-line microphone is more than adequate for calls. Not sure about them in terms of longevity, only had them a couple of weeks. Both the clip and pouch that they come with make it easy to carry them around without getting tangled up. EDIT: Nearly 6 months down the line, they're still working perfectly. EDIT: A year down the line, the left ear began having problems - cutting out and more static than sound. Overall very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable earphones I've ever used. If you are struggling to find a pair that don't hurt your ears after an hour or so, look no further. As with most skullcandy products, these have very punchy bass, while also delivering clear highs and mids. They look good and don't fall out. The only negative I have is the lack of a flat cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Giles

customer_reviews.title: Finally earphones with good bass!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a proper bass in earphones for a very long time, unfortunately there were always some issues - either buds falling out of my ears or not comfortable design or just poor quality. These earphones are just amazing. Great design, high quality, massive bass and some really cool details. Best earphones I had so far and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: grzehoo04

customer_reviews.title: Good for piercings
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. I have a daith and tragus piercing in my right and left ears respectively and these ear buds sit snugly and comfortably in my ears without annoying my piercings. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle N.

customer_reviews.title: OK product
customer_reviews.text: Decent set of ear phones rly good to have a run in and grate to do and sort of exersize in the only thing about them is the sound can be silent compared to other headphones still can here but when you want it up rly loud doesn't always allow you too. Also the button to play and stop music ect is hard to push at times because it is a small button but bass is decent and OK money for a skull candy product.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Can't really beat them for the price. I've used skullcandy earphones for years and in this price range, you won't find any better
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and cool BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones overall and very stylish too...only thing missing is the volume control on the cable like so many others...
customer_reviews.author: Eric BC

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for small ear canals.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these ear buds especially for walking or running. They stay in place and are suitable for my small ear canals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price and good quality at this price range. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones use them every night in bed. Arrived early
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a plane, since they can get pretty loud. These worked prefect, were incredibly comfortable, and 4 months on, they still work just as good. One of my best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan James Brady

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 6 weeks...
customer_reviews.text: I received these earphones 6 weeks ago and they were working fine. I did not mishandle the product, but as of today the right earbud functions at half the volume of the left earbud....
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Ayoub

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Usually can't use in-ear headphones but absolutely fine with these. Sound quality is excellent and the play/pause button actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good for music but not as a hands free
customer_reviews.text: It’s. not compatible with apple iPhones , you can not use it to make phone calls
customer_reviews.author: paris

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earphones less than a month ago and they have already broken! Am very dissapointed! The earbud itself has started to fall off on the left. For the price I expected better quality! However, the actual earphones themselves have been good with aspects such as the sound quality and they also stay in my ears well.
customer_reviews.author: KeziaM

customer_reviews.title: Buy these earphones!
customer_reviews.text: it's the second time when i buy these earphones. the first pair lasted 3 years! just bought the second one. i'm sure they will last even more if i take good care of them.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine but then after less than 6 months the left ear goes silent. Would not reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but really really heavy on the bass, not to my taste, have sold them on!
customer_reviews.author: Giorgio Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but they do slip out of the ear
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some reviews say, the ear buds do not seat that well in your ear. I've been using during my running workouts and I'm constantly fixing it. But the worst is really Amazon's FX rates used in the billing. I paid implicitly GBP to Eur at 1.49 when on those dates it was at 1.42. They should warn about these implicit costs (let alone VAT!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Silva

customer_reviews.title: Just no!
customer_reviews.text: After I’d run 2k with these I knew they weren’t up to the job. The buds just wouldn’t stay in my ears and kept dropping out every couple of minutes no matter what I tried. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Borgars

customer_reviews.title: Cool and clever
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, good fit, excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.author: martin witort

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Lasted just under 6 months then right side stopped working. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MR S J AMPHLETT

customer_reviews.title: Great value headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, stay in the ears well when running, control on the headphone a bit unresponsive though
customer_reviews.author: Gary leach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They came quick and are easy to use and good for money very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Koala-bulldog

customer_reviews.title: One of the best pairs of headphones I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pairs of headphones I've ever had! Quality is amazing, the previous ones lasted me 2 years with everyday gym use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: nice big crack in earbuds exactly one month from purchase complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My second pair as they fit perfectly with tragus piercings. Also bought a pair for the wife.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Dyer

customer_reviews.title: so glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, so glad I bought them. The sound is flawless and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Berry

customer_reviews.title: Broken in just over a month
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for just over a month and one of the ear buds has stopped working. Not very good as these are little more expensive than others on the site I had certainly expected a year out of the,. I would like a replacement but I cannot see a way to contact the seller. Until they broke I really liked these ear phones, always stayed in my ear when running and the sound quality was good in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ali_winter

customer_reviews.title: Colourful!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound. Nice deep bass. For the price I believe volume switches would have been possible. But overall a brilliant product
customer_reviews.author: helen hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality I use them for running and commuting they give great sound quality
customer_reviews.author: A1 CLK

customer_reviews.title: Sound ok, but not brilliant - for the price, can't complain
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality not as good as some of the competition. But ok
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: Very good for how much they are
customer_reviews.text: Very good for how much they are. Stay in ears whilst running and sound quality is good! Go get em.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price range. Lightweight, durable and nice sound
customer_reviews.author: markthedrummer

customer_reviews.title: The sound seems OK but considering these are designed for ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound seems OK but considering these are designed for use whilst working out, I'm surprised they've made the remote so difficult to use. You have to press quite hard to change track so it's awkward when focusing on an exercise, and they don't have a volume control as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: H. V. T.

customer_reviews.title: got some from hmv and they are really bad. Usually the small earbuds fit my ears but ...
customer_reviews.text: got some from hmv and they are really bad. Usually the small earbuds fit my ears but these are much too big ( even the small one ) and everytime I run they fall out of my ear
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Method In-Ear Headphones With In-Line Mic - Swirl/Coolgray/Charcoal
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Light Grey/Grey

Super Secure Sport Performance

Method's sweat resistant earbuds offer a super secure and comfortable fit during those training sessions where you push your limits. Fix, Off-Axis and StickyGels tech boost the performance of these earbuds when you're covered in sweat.

Skullcandy 2015

We celebrate the risk-takers; innovators and pioneers; those who break from the herd and forge their own path. We celebrate them living life on their terms and the soundtracks that inspire them. They motivate us to be uncompromising, unapologetic, to express ourselves and stay true to who we are no matter the consequences.
To live at full volume.



BOX CONTAINS
Skullcandy Method Womens In-Ear Headphones With Mic Swirl/Coolgraey/Charcoal
